name: 黃希敏
objective: 引導學生瞭解如何根據不同對象、不同場合、不同時間、不同情境，貼切地使用英語，也概括介紹分析語言溝通所需的概念與工具。
schedule:
Week 01  Introduction 1
Week 02  Introduction 2
Week 03  Yule 1: Definition and background
Week 04  Yule 2: Deixis and distance
Week 05  Yule 3: Reference and inference
Week 06　　Yule 4: Presupposition and entailment
Week 07　　Yule 5: Cooperation and implication
Week 08　　Yule 6: Speech acts and events
Week 09　　Yule 7: Politeness and interaction
Week 10  Yule 8: Conversation and preference structure
Week 11  (Presentation) Peccei 1: What is Pragmatics + Peccei 2: Entailment
Week 12  (Presentation) Peccei 3: Presuppositon
Week 13  (Presentation) Peccei 4: The co-operative principle and implicature
Week 14  (Presentation) Peccei 5: More on implicatures
Week 15  (Presentation) Peccei 6: Speech acts
Week 16  (Presentation) Peccei 7: More about speech acts
Week 17  (Presentation) Peccei 8: Politeness
Week 18　　 Yule 9:Discourse and culture + Peccei 9: Making sense
materials:
1. Yule, George: Pragmatics (Oxford)
2. Peccei, Jean Stilwell: Pragmatics (Routledge)
